Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.
A list of main networks is shown. The Show Test Networks toggle is shown. The Add Network button is shown.
The extended view opens in a new tab. The current network is shown. The Account is shown. The Settings Menu is shown. The list of popular networks is shown.

Test steps: Add a Network from the list of Popular custom networks.
Expected result: The name, URL, chain ID, currency symbol and block explorer URL are shown in the network details.
The network is successfully added. The option to switch to the added network is shown. The option to dismiss is shown.
The network is switched. The Things to keep in mind screen is shown. The MATIC balance is shown on the overview.
